Artemis::

She arrived and trasformed to robot mode "What about an ambush or 
just arrive and shot?"

Slugde:

"Slugde wants to know who's the enemy" said the Dinobot as soon as he 
arrived

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@n...> wrote:
> ::Repugnus/Slag/JetV::
> 
> Repugnus continues running at Switchblade while emitting color 
waves to 
> disrupt the bots optic sensors.
> 
> ::Slag::
> Slag spits another wave of fire towards Dogged.
> 
> ::JetV::
> JetV arrives at the battle scene some bit away. He scans the area. 
> "Artemis, you have any plans for this battle?"
> 
> cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> 
> > Switchblade smirked as his missles scored direct hits. "YESSSSS" 
he shouted
> > assuming victory was at hand. His cry of joy was prematurely 
inturupted as
> > two laser beams pierced the smoke below. "Cybrats beware, they're 
more
> > durable than we figured." The buglike bot swerved aside dodging 
the beams
> > scanning them as they struck the building behind him. a laser 
line connected
> > two blades on his arm, he launched it down onto the street below 
hoping to
> > measure Grimlocks strength by pinning him to the ground before 
disassembling
> > him.
> > ------------------------------
> > 
> > 
> > The bot swears, spinning around and jumping back. His scanners 
locate the
> > bot that had attacked him, and he fires a missile back.
> > 
> > ------------------------------------
> > Doggeds line had hit it's target but for some reason didn't hold. 
He lept
> > skyward drawing his disk launcher. He fired a stasis disk at the 
bum
> > planning on the disks energy draining qualities to down his 
opponent. A
> > missle steeked by him striking a building behind him. debris 
began to fall
> > forcing Doggeds attention to be diverted. he lept from side to 
side using
> > his speed to avoid the falling metal. he quickly grabbed a jagged 
piece of
> > metal andhurled it with all the velocity he could muster at the 
bum.
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: robertdahl <rdahl@t...>
> > To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> > Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 8:13 AM
> > Subject: Re: The bum and the hole....
> > 
> > 
> >  > Grimlock kept smelling Repugnas. Yes, he knew this robot. It 
was an
> >  > Autobot. He sighed. That meant it would be wrong to rip it 
apart. "Me
> >  > say are you..." he was cut off as the two armor piercing 
shells hit him,
> >  > and exploded, sending him falling on his side. He snarled, 
turned his
> >  > head, and opened his mouth, letting loose a stream of laser 
fire at the
> >  > attacker. "Yeh, now Dinobots stomp."
